about:
Hadal Calm is a 2D Action-Platformer featuring PVP combat, cooperative survival modes, and a short single-player campaign.

Equip +40 different weapons and +100 unique upgrades in frantic arena battles.

This game was made using LIBGDX.
credits: royalty free sfx: Kenney, Mattia Cellotto, www.fesliyanstudios.com, taira-komori.jpn.org/freesounden.html, MaouDamashii
misc:
It is recommended to play the game in fullscreen mode. (Enabled in SETTINGS -> DISPLAY)

The game can be played with local or remote multiplayer. To host a server remotely, enable port forwarding on the chosen port. (default port: 11100)

Server capacity can be set in SETTINGS -> MISC. It is recommended to leave this at 4 for performance reasons.

There exists a connection bug where a client will not load all of the map events. If this happens, return to the hub to hopefully fix it.

While intended for single-player, the campaign can be done with a friend by hosting a server and selecting the map "sstunicate1" from the bonus level event.
tips:
Eggplant Mode can be enabled in SETTINGS -> GAME -> PVP MODE. In this mode, players score by collecting Eggplants that spawn in the map.

This game is best played with headphones. Sounds can warn to the prescence and location of enemies.

Airblast can be used to reflect enemy projectiles. Reflected projectiles deal bonus damage.

Hitsounds can be changed or turned off at SETTINGS -> AUDIO -> HITSOUNDS.
